DOC.brief_summary: Participants complete FE200486 CS21 study ( NCT00295750 ) could enter FE200486 CS21A study . The study continue non-discontinued participant receive treatment least 5 year .
DOC.brief_title: A Long-term Extension Study Evaluating One-Month Dosing Regimen Degarelix Prostate Cancer Requiring Androgen Ablation Therapy
DOC.criteria: Inclusion/ Patients histologically proven prostate cancer stage endocrine treatment indicate . Signed informed consent The patient must complete FE 200486 CS21 Study .
